channel.title: Perl Weekly newsletter
channel.description: A free, once a week e-mail round-up of hand-picked news and articles about Perl.

item.title: #400 - 400th Edition of Perl Weekly Newsletter
item.description:
Hi there

Take a look at the first edition of Perl Weekly Newsletter launched on 1st August 2011. I know many subscribers personally who always look forward to the weekly newsletter. Since the launch of the newsletter, the Chief Editor, Gabor Szabo, have had many helping hands e.g. Yanick Champoux, Neil Bowers, D Ruth Holloway and Upasana Shukla. I joined the panel of editors in the month of May 2018.

The other thing that made lots of noise last week was the Perl Weekly Challenge. Today it is launched with the first challenge. If you haven't joined the team of hackers then please join by dropping a line to perlweeklychallenge@yahoo.com or simply email the solution and that would do the job.

For more information, please follow the Frequently Asked Questions page.

Enjoy reading the rest of the newsletter.
